timeline.message:
Http client ignore/match; micrometer 1.6.2

* Bump Micrometer version to 1.6.2
* Configuration options for Http client metrics
* Add (trivial) extension for prometheus registry dependency
* Fix exception from JSON Exporter when Gauge value is NaN

micrometer 1.6.2; prometheus ext; http client cfg
